title: Disconnection Issues
body: Just got disconnected multiple times in a ranked match of League. It's not too big of a deal, but I checked my connection while it was happening, and my internet connection was fine. Anyway, not trying to make a big deal of this, but I figured I should mention something in case it isn't just me.

replies.body:
Most disconnection issues are caused by incompatible network settings that are local to your PC. I strongly recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your local settings are good.

Let me know if those steps resolve your disconnections.
It's been happening to me, just random ATR today.
